name: Construct (itch)
description:
A very short  experiment , my submission for AdventureX  Gamejam 2020 #AdvXJam 

PREMISE:

Sometime when we look at the world around us we only hear the noise. 

There's a place where the hum is going on forever. You just got stuck there.

CONTROLS:

To control your avatar use point-and-click.

Sounds from FreeSound.org  (janbezouska, pjborg)

Music by m∞tro
